name: SCNParticleSystem.ParticleProperty
desc: Keys identifying properties of individual particles, used by the propertyControllers dictionary and the handle(_:forProperties:handler:) and addModifier(forProperties:at:modifier:) methods.

items.name: static let angle: SCNParticleSystem.ParticleProperty
items.desc: The rotation angle, in radians, of the particle about its axis.

items.name: static let angularVelocity: SCNParticleSystem.ParticleProperty
items.desc: The particle’s angular velocity (or rate of spin), in radians per second.

items.name: static let charge: SCNParticleSystem.ParticleProperty
items.desc: The particle’s electric charge, in coulombs.

items.name: static let color: SCNParticleSystem.ParticleProperty
items.desc: The particle’s tint color, as a vector of red, green, blue, and alpha component values.

items.name: static let contactNormal: SCNParticleSystem.ParticleProperty
items.desc: The normal vector, in scene coordinate space, of a collision between a particle and a geometry in the scene.

items.name: static let contactPoint: SCNParticleSystem.ParticleProperty
items.desc: The location, in scene coordinate space, of a collision between a particle and a geometry in the scene.

items.name: static let frame: SCNParticleSystem.ParticleProperty
items.desc: The current frame index of the particle’s image animation.

items.name: static let frameRate: SCNParticleSystem.ParticleProperty
items.desc: The rate, in frames per second, of the particle’s image animation.

items.name: static let life: SCNParticleSystem.ParticleProperty
items.desc: The remaining time in the particle’s life span, in seconds.

items.name: static let position: SCNParticleSystem.ParticleProperty
items.desc: The particle’s position vector in scene coordinate space.

items.name: static let rotationAxis: SCNParticleSystem.ParticleProperty
items.desc: The particle’s axis of rotation, expressed as a vector in the particle’s local coordinate space.

items.name: static let size: SCNParticleSystem.ParticleProperty
items.desc: The width and height of the rendered particle image, in units of scene coordinate space.

items.name: static let velocity: SCNParticleSystem.ParticleProperty
items.desc: The particle’s velocity vector in units (of scene coordinate space) per second.
